ing: 1 (16 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
1 (7 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers, drained and rinsed
des: "It's a tasty, healthy dip to liven up those cut-up veggies."
ins: Put cannellini beans, roasted red bell peppers, avocado, basil, garlic, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, paprika, salt, pepper, and curry powder in a food processor bowl; process until smooth. With the processor running, slowly stream olive oil into the mixture until smooth.
